Just leave for 6 minutes and I'll restart your Windows

13 Aug 2006

I've been trying to transfer (temporarily) my life from linux/gentoo to Windows. This is hugely inspired by my new gadget, Nokia E61 and some other extreme-planning habits. Nokia/symbian still doesn't have any reasonable way to sync calendar and notes with linux calendaring apps. So, welcome, dear windows xp service pack 2 :) For a start, I'm never going to leave my dear Windows XP alone for more than 4 minutes:
